text: Any interest in open source? Adding new functionality?

<@U25PYL3Q8> so much interest, that here’s the github, and check out our issues to see our new feature ideas. We’d love to have another person get involved. <https://github.com/williamspiro/HubSpot-Developer-Extension>

Here is an issue: when you upgrade an old module to the new framework and it's already included in a template, then if you edit that template and change something in the module's default content (in the template, not the module itself) your module will break - no content will be shown. The only workaround I could find was swapping that module with itself.
